column12: at blue ridge therapy connection in stuart
column15: in rockingham county to joe s. and hester mabe bullins. mrs. bennett was a homemaker
column16: and had been a resident of stokes county for more than 50 years. she was a member of old orchard primitive baptist church. an 11:00 am funeral service will be held

column20: with elder scotty marshall and elder rodney marshall officiating. burial will follow at the piney grove primitive baptist church cemetery. in addition to her parents

column28: and nina priddy. surviving are her children; wayne brown (lois)
column39: and 18 great grandchildren. the family will receive friends from 6pm 8pm wednesday
column42: and other times at the home of her son tony. online condolences may be offered at www. burroughsfuneralhome. com. burroughs funeral in walnut cove is serving the bennett family.
